name: The Amazing Spider-Man™ Ultimate Edition
description: Your Power. Your Choices. Your Playground. Set shortly after the events of Columbia Pictures' new film, The Amazing Spider-Man is back with the return of web-slinging action! • Everybody’s favorite web-head is back with the return of the fan-favorite web-slinging gameplay. • Perform acrobatic attacks and stealth maneuvers with the brand new web rush combat system. • Uncover the rest of Peter Parker’s untold story in the all-new epilogue story to the Columbia Pictures' 2012 blockbuster theatrical release.
